review: I was fine with this for a while but now it is taking forever to stop pausing and loading.  It takes about 15 minutes to get Hulu watchable but it comes in fine on my Sony tablet via the app, with the tablet in the same room.Worse than just stopping, it will also start playing audio with a stuck video screen.  I hope it is just an update away for a fix, but it had better pick up its game or it will be removed.
